title: Horizontal and vertical asymptotes of a function

content.prompt: The graph of which of the following functions has exactly one horizontal asymptote and no vertical asymptotes?

topic.text: 1.15: Connecting Limits at Infinity and Horizontal Asymptotes

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Identify how mathematical characteristics or properties of functions are related in different representations.
